snippet: BURZIN--Carol. Carol lost a long and courageous battle, but won the admiration, respect and love of everyone who knew her. She was kind and generous with an infectious laugh and smile that will always be remembered. She will be missed by all. Our deepest condolences to uncle Phil, Jeff, Karen, Sarah, Amy and Katie. Joel, Elaine, Beth, Jill and Robert Burzin 1/3
lead_paragraph: BURZIN--Carol. Carol lost a long and courageous battle, but won the admiration, respect and love of everyone who knew her. She was kind and generous with an infectious laugh and smile that will always be remembered. She will be missed by all. Our deepest condolences to uncle Phil, Jeff, Karen, Sarah, Amy and Katie. Joel, Elaine, Beth, Jill and Robert Burzin 1/3
